theme_mode_desc: Choose the theme mode for the app
notification_desc: Allow the app to send notifications
sync_calendar_desc: Sync shift information to system calendar
backup_warning_desc: Backup data will be lost when the app is uninstalled. Please export your backups regularly
reset_desc: Reset all settings to default values
confirm_reset_desc: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to default values? This action cannot be undone.
settings_reset: Settings have been reset to default values
language_changed: Language setting has been changed, please restart the app to apply changes
clear_data_warning: This action will clear all data and cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to continue?
backup_all_data: Backup all app data to local storage
export_backup_desc: Export backup file to other apps
restore_from_backups_desc: Choose and restore data from any backup file
restore_from_file_desc: Restore data from a selected backup file
confirm_restore_latest_desc: Are you sure you want to restore data from the latest backup? Current data will be overwritten.
confirm_restore_file_desc: Are you sure you want to restore data from the selected backup file? Current data will be overwritten.
clear_cache_confirm: Are you sure you want to clear cache? Cache size
clear_all_data_desc: Delete all app data including shifts, alarms, etc.
faq_add_shift_answer: Tap on a date in the home calendar, select 'Add Shift', then choose a shift type.
faq_create_shift_type: How to create a custom shift type?
faq_create_shift_type_answer: In the 'Shifts' page, tap the '+' button in the bottom right, then fill in the shift name, time, and color information.
faq_set_alarm_answer: In the 'Alarms' page, tap the plus button in the bottom right, set the alarm time and repeat rules, then save. Make sure you've enabled notification permissions in settings.
faq_backup_data_answer: In the 'Me' page, tap 'Data Management', then select 'Create Backup'. You can also export the backup file to other apps.
faq_view_statistics_answer: In the 'Statistics' page, you can view monthly work hours, shift distribution, and other statistics. You can select different time ranges for viewing.
faq_sync_calendar: How to sync with system calendar?
faq_sync_calendar_answer: In 'App Settings', enable the 'Sync with System Calendar' option, and your shift information will automatically sync to your system calendar.
feedback_hint: Please describe the issue or suggestion
community_desc: Join our user community to share experiences
export_logs_desc: Export app logs to help troubleshoot issues
